title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4116.11 - Trainer's responsibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4116.11 - Trainer's responsibility

State Regulations
A trainer is responsible for the condition, fitness, equipment and soundness of each horse at the time it is declared to race and
thereafter when it starts in a race. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4116.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
